latex:
In the sequence $ 2001, 2002, 2003, \ldots$, each term after the third is found by subtracting the previous term from the sum of the two terms that precede that term. For example, the fourth term is $ 2001 + 2002 - 2003 = 2000$. What is the $ 2004^\text{th}$ term in this sequence?\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)} - \! 2004 \qquad \textbf{(B)} - \! 2 \qquad \textbf{(C)}\ 0 \qquad \textbf{(D)}\ 4003 \qquad \textbf{(E)}\ 6007$
